SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class ResponseDecoder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.ResponseDecoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResponseHandler
public class ResponseDecoder extends Object implements ResponseHandler
this class is used to decode and handle the messages incoming from the server (only for Socket purposes)

  • Method Details

    • handle

      public void handle(LoginResponse loginResponse) throws RemoteException
      handle method to get the login response and notify the client about it. After that, it sets the boolean of the controller setReceivedResponse to true, and it notifies all the waiting threads to unlock them.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface ResponseHandler
      Parameters:
      loginResponse - - login response message sent by server socket
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • handle

      Parameters:

    • handle

      public void handle(NotifyOnTurn notifyOnTurn) throws RemoteException

    • handle

      public void handle(DisconnectionNotif disconnectionNotif) throws RemoteException
      method used to handle the disconnection notification from the server (i.e. when a client has disconnected and the game needs to be closed). After that, it sets the boolean of the controller setReceivedResponse to true, and it notifies all the waiting threads to unlock them.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface ResponseHandler
      Parameters:
      disconnectionNotif - - the disconnection notification sent by the server socket
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • handle

      public void handle(ColumnOk moveOk) throws RemoteException
      method used to handle the response from the server after choosing the column. After that, it sets the boolean of the controller setReceivedResponse to true, and it notifies all the waiting threads to unlock them.
      Specified by:
      handle in interface ResponseHandler
      Parameters:
      moveOk - - choose column move confirm notification sent by server socket

      RemoteException

    • handle

      public void handle(ModelUpdateNotification modelUpdateNotification) throws RemoteException
      method used to handle a model update. It calls an update of the model. After that, it sets the boolean of the controller setReceivedResponse to true, and it notifies all the waiting threads to unlock them.

      modelUpdateNotification - - model update notification sent by server socket
